item.title: 拉加德称其"基本预期"是完成欧洲央行任期，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，她基本打算完成欧洲央行行长的任期，此前有报道称她将提前卸任。【原文：Christine Lagarde said her base case is to see out her term as European Central Bank president, following a report this week that she’ll step down early.】

item.title: 印度2月经济活动加速，采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司的初步调查显示，随着美国大幅削减对印度商品的关税，印度市场情绪好转，该国2月份经济活动加速。【原文：India’s economic activity accelerated in February as sentiment improved after the US slashed tariffs on Indian goods, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 沙特对印石油供应激增，缩小与最大供应国俄罗斯的差距
item.description: 印度本月将从沙特阿拉伯进口逾六年来的最大规模原油，此前这个南亚国家持续面临美国施压，要求其减少购买俄罗斯原油。【原文：India is set to import the most crude from Saudi Arabia in more than six years this month, as the South Asian nation faces sustained US pressure to reduce purchases of Russian barrels.】

item.title: 马来西亚1月出口增速创逾三年新高
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部周五公布的数据显示，受电子产品出货量激增推动，该国1月份出口增速创下逾三年新高。【原文：Malaysian exports, driven by a surge in electronics shipments, rose at the fastest pace in over three years in January, according to data released by the Ministry of Investment, Trade and Industry on Friday.】

item.title: 收益率飙升吸引日本债券1月资金流入接近纪录高位
item.description: 上月海外投资者购入日本国债的规模创历史第二高，因收益率上升抵消了政府支出激增的风险。【原文：Overseas investors purchased the second-largest amount of Japanese government bonds on record last month, as higher yields compensated buyers for the risk of a blowout in government spending.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市、货币下跌，伊朗紧张局势升级，油价飙升
item.description: 随着伊朗局势紧张加剧，亚洲新兴市场股票和货币普遍下跌，油价被推升至六个月高位，投资者风险偏好持续萎缩。【原文：Emerging Asian stocks and currencies fell as tensions in Iran intensified, pushing up oil prices to their highest in six months and eroding risk appetite.】

item.title: 西班牙在美中关系恶化之际推行新亚洲战略，积极拉拢中国
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德·特朗普颠覆全球经济秩序，西班牙正计划与中国建立更多政治和金融联系。【原文：Spain is planning to build more political and financial links to China as US President Donald Trump upends the global economic order.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格在韩国央行会议前进一步上涨
item.description: 首尔公寓价格延续涨势，尽管涨势放缓至近五个月来最低水平——农历新年假期抑制了需求，而市场正等待下周央行会议审议利率政策。【原文：Seoul apartment prices extended their gains, ahead of next week’s central bank meeting to review interest rates, though the pace of increase slowed to the weakest in about five months as the Lunar New Year holiday dampened demand.】

item.title: UPL押注种子业务IPO，通过供应链调整削减债务
item.description: 全球最大的农药仿制药供应商之一UPL有限公司正寄望于种子业务上市及更严谨的执行力，以重建投资者信心。此前该公司因债务驱动的扩张遭遇农药价格下跌的冲击。【原文：UPL Ltd., one of the world’s largest generic crop-protection suppliers, is counting on a seeds-unit listing and tighter execution to rebuild investor confidence after a debt-fueled expansion collided with a downturn in crop-chemical prices.】

item.title: 巴西与印度将深化关键矿产与技术合作
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦与印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪即将举行会晤，两国将在关键矿产和人工智能领域加强合作。在全球秩序脆弱之际，两国正积极为发展中国家争取话语权。【原文：Brazil and India are set to strengthen cooperation on critical minerals and artificial intelligence when President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva meets Prime Minister Narendra Modi, as the two nations position themselves as leading voices for the developing world amid a fragile global order.】

item.title: 阿根廷众议院通过米莱标志性劳动改革法案
item.description: 阿根廷国会下议院通过了总统哈维尔·米莱标志性的劳动改革法案，这是这位自由主义者雄心勃勃议程中的关键一步，有望助力该国重返全球市场。【原文：Argentina’s lower house of Congress passed President Javier Milei’s signature labor reform bill, a key step in the libertarian’s ambitious agenda that could help the nation return to global markets.】

item.title: 印度将正式加入美国主导的《硅谷和平条约》供应链安全协议
item.description: 印度即将正式加入美国主导的供应链保护倡议，该倡议涵盖关键矿产等领域，这再次表明在经历动荡的一年后，两国关系正重启。【原文：India is set to formally join a US-led initiative to protect supply chains, including on critical minerals, in another sign that both sides are resetting ties after a turbulent year.】

item.title: 肯尼亚筹集22.5亿美元，拟赎回2028年和2032年到期债券
item.description: 肯尼亚发行了22.5亿美元债券用于债务回购，加入了非洲主权国家借贷成本下降之际涌向国际市场的浪潮。【原文：Kenya raised $2.25 billion of bonds to finance a debt buyback, joining a wave of African sovereigns tapping international markets as borrowing costs ease.】

item.title: 美国从台湾进口额首次超过中国，创数十年之最
item.description: 数十年来，美国从台湾地区的进口额首次超过中国大陆。特朗普总统的关税政策重塑了贸易流向，而全球人工智能热潮则推动了科技产品的需求。【原文：The US imported more from Taiwan than China for the first time in decades as President Donald Trump’s tariffs reshape trade flows while a global boom in artificial intelligence fuels demand for tech products.】

item.title: 汇丰、渣打业绩将显现战略调整成效
item.description: 渣打集团首席财务官的突然离职，以及汇丰控股斥资数十亿美元收购银行股权的深远影响，将在两家银行公布财报时成为焦点。【原文：The shock exit of Standard Chartered Plc’s finance chief and the implications of HSBC Holdings Plc’s multibillion-dollar purchase of a bank stake will loom large as the two report earnings.】

item.title: 日本经济活动创2023年以来最强劲，得益于高市早苗的推动
item.description: 日本制造业活动在产出稳健支撑下连续第三个月保持扩张态势，表明企业信心增强。正值首相高市早苗准备推进其投资计划之际。【原文：Japan’s manufacturing activity stayed expansionary for a third month on the back of solid output, signaling firmer corporate sentiment as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi prepares to promote her investment plans.】

item.title: 华尔街抢购印度银行短期债务，因收益率飙升
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在收益率飙升后，华尔街贷款机构近期大量购入印度银行发售的定期存单。【原文：Wall Street lenders bought up a chunk of certificates of deposits sold by Indian banks in recent weeks after yields shot up, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 铜价连续第三周下跌，库存持续攀升
item.description: 铜价连续第三周下跌，交易所追踪的库存持续增加，因工业用户需求疲软。【原文：Copper headed for a third weekly loss, as exchange-tracked inventories continued to build on weaker demand from industrial users.】

item.title: 蓝猫公司向养老金巨头和自有保险公司出售私人贷款
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司面临其某私募信贷基金的现金返还期限迫近，为偿付投资者，该公司为价值14亿美元的贷款组合找到了四家买家：北美三大养老基金以及其自有保险公司。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc., facing a looming deadline to return cash in one of its private credit funds, found four buyers for a $1.4 billion portfolio of loans to help pay out investors: Three of North America’s biggest pension funds and its own insurance firm.】

item.title: 印尼计划通过110亿美元股票发售满足流通股目标
item.description: 印尼正准备进行约110亿美元的股票发售，以满足更严格的流通股规定，此举旨在避免被明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）降级为前沿市场。【原文：Indonesia is bracing for share sales of around $11 billion to meet tougher free-float rules aimed at heading off a potential downgrade to frontier market status by MSCI Inc.】

item.title: 全球资金涌入印度国有银行，信贷增长势头强劲
item.description: 追踪国有银行的指数今年迄今已上涨12%。【原文：An index tracking state-owned lenders is up 12% so far this year.】

item.title: 铁矿石或创2022年以来最长连跌纪录，因供应端显现积极信号
item.description: 铁矿石正朝着2022年以来最长的周跌幅纪录迈进，因市场出现松动迹象：澳大利亚供应量增加，中国港口库存居高不下。【原文：Iron ore was on track for the longest streak of weekly losses since 2022, weighed by signs of a loosening market as flows improved from Australia and Chinese ports saw elevated stockpiles.】

item.title: 诺华以1.59亿美元出售持股退出印度上市公司
item.description: 诺华集团已同意出售其在印度上市子公司的多数股权，标志着两年前宣布的战略审查计划最终完成。【原文：Novartis AG has agreed to sell a majority stake in its listed Indian unit, marking the culmination of a strategic review announced two years ago.】

item.title: 中国AI初创企业假期后迎来爆发式增长，大型科技公司轮番涌入
item.description: 中国生成式人工智能初创企业智普科技和MiniMax集团的股票在香港市场农历新年后重启交易时大幅上涨，投资者纷纷涌入纯粹的人工智能概念股，同时撤出传统互联网巨头。【原文：Shares of China’s generative AI startups Zhipu and MiniMax Group Inc. soared in Hong Kong as the market reopened after the Lunar New Year, with investors piling into pure AI plays and rotating out of traditional Internet giants.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院允许警方深化对Banco Master的调查
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官安德烈·门东萨扩大了联邦警察对Banco Master SA银行欺诈案的调查权限，这意味着当局得以深化此次令该国政治和金融体系动荡的调查。【原文：Brazil Supreme Court Justice Andre Mendonca broadened Federal Police access to a fraud investigation into Banco Master SA, effectively allowing authorities to deepen the probe that has rattled the country’s political and financial systems.】

item.title: 美元有望创10月以来最佳单周表现，美联储降息预期减弱
item.description: 美元正准备创下四个月来最佳周表现，因交易员下调对美联储降息的预期，同时地缘政治风险提升了该货币的避险吸引力。【原文：The dollar is poised to notch its best week in four months as traders pare back expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts while geopolitical risks boost the currency’s haven appeal.】

item.title: 纽蒙特与巴里克就内华达合资项目发生争执，通知已发出
item.description: 纽蒙特公司向巴里克黄金公司发出所谓违约通知书，此前该公司发现其在内华达州合资企业存在管理不当的证据，导致双方在重要采矿区域的合作关系紧张升级。【原文：Newmont Corp. sent Barrick Mining Corp. a so-called notice of default after finding evidence of alleged mismanagement at a Nevada joint venture, escalating tensions between the partners in a key mining region.】

item.title: 押注马斯克SpaceX股价，韩国券商股暴涨200%
item.description: 未来资产证券公司股价今年已飙升逾三倍，成为投资者押注埃隆·马斯克旗下SpaceX公司的替代投资标的，该公司即将进行可能引发轰动的首次公开募股。【原文：Mirae Asset Securities Co. shares have more than tripled this year as a proxy bet on Elon Musk’s SpaceX ahead of its potential blockbuster initial public offering.】

item.title: 前谷歌工程师被控窃取手机处理器技术
item.description: 两名前谷歌工程师及其丈夫之一被起诉，指控其涉嫌窃取与该公司Pixel手机Tensor处理器相关的商业机密。【原文：Two former Google engineers and one of their husbands were indicted for allegedly stealing trade secrets relating to the company’s Tensor processor for Pixel phones.】

item.title: 玩具制造商Funko吸引精明投资者Pleasant Lake入股
item.description: 对冲基金Pleasant Lake Partners披露其为玩具制造商Funko Inc.的投资者，并正敦促该公司启动正式出售流程，该基金表示可参与其中。【原文：Hedge fund Pleasant Lake Partners disclosed it’s an investor in toymaker Funko Inc., and is pushing the company to launch a formal sale process that it said it could participate in.】
